text: A remarkable act of generosity! Norton Healthcare receives a $20 million gift to the "Just Imagine" campaign from the late Dr. Elizabeth Cressman. Her visionary support has already established critical care centers and Parkinson's research facilities. This latest donation will further expand programs within the Cressman Parkinson's Movement and Disorders Center and Cressman Parkinson's Research. A true testament to the power of individual philanthropy in advancing healthcare for all.
